content.detailedDescription: Driving toward myrtle beach about 30 miles north near the town of aynor i noticed a bright reddish orange orb appearing stationary under the cloud cover. it was just after sunset and there was a solid cloud cover @ approx 2000ft, no stars or moon visible. the object came into my view and disappeared after about 45 seconds. was not able to keep it in view the whole 45 seconds due to tree line and buildings along the route. driving about 45-55 mph.  i realize there is not much information here but i want to report in case there were other witnesses which might have more complete details and thereby have some corroboration.
content.summary: Glowing orb

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were headed south on the highway and it was a very warm beautiful day. so i looked up in the sky and saw one jet flying with a long tail of exhaust behind it. about one mile left of the plane in the sky i could see what appeared to be four flying objects flying so fast that they were moving out of sight second by second. as i looked hard, i could see no wings! they were dark grey so i thought they were maybe fighter jets but they had no wings and there was no sound. so i pointed to my friend and told him to look up and tell me what he thought they were and he almost stopped in the highway. it caught him by shock too, so i felt so good i was not alone seeing this. the 4 objects then shifted positions as flying fast and were flying so close to one another they should have crashed and at one point they all looked as if they all piled up together to form one object and then flew apart again. they then flew even faster and out of sight. i was thinking how can anything withstand the pressure of that flying force and how were they flying with no wings? i am stumped. they flew out of sight as they went south and over water towards this large river area. there were mist like clouds they approached which made them appear harder to see as they flew out of sight as well.
content.summary: 4 long oval in shape objects were flying fast similar to 4 fighter jests, except there were no wings. the missing wings is what stunned me!

content.detailedDescription: Im not sure that what i have seen was a ufo, but it is odd.  several times in a month craft will fly over town around 2am.  these craft have a low rubble or roaring sound. normally there are 1 to 3 craft and when greater numbers seem to fly in a line.  the lights on them seem to flash in a pattern oddly match on all craft when more than one. they fly low in the sky far lower than comercial aircraft in the area and appear though to be about a jet sized craft.  they always fly out of the sw and towards the ne.  now these may be some sort of niltary craft but are flying very low.  an odd thing that is worth mentioning is that at least once a month following the same general fight direction, mulitple unmarked, dark grey to black helicopters fly over the area.  these flights take place during the day and are extremely low as if searching for something.  im not one to jump to conclusions but these events have been happening for years now and to put it plainly are just odd.  your opinion would be appreciated.
content.summary: The craft tends to fly overhead low in the sky around 2am from sw to ne seems to happen several times in a month

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching tv and gust looked out the window and thats when it caught my eye i though it was a star at first. but it was snowing out there was no other stars out and it was geting clouser and clouser i went and got a pare of binoculars and wached i moveing slow heading from  east to south east before slowey disapering in to cloud cover and then hearing a cuple of jets headind twords it last location. 
durning and after the sighting i was fearful.
content.summary: Strange

content.detailedDescription:
I had just left my apartment in dallas, texas about 8:30 pm monday, april 1st, 2013.  i turned right out of my apartment complex on to beckley avenue heading north, and then i took an immediate left turn on to greenbriar heading west towards kessler parkway when an aircraft flew out of the trees heading south.  i knew it was not a helicopter. my mind tried to make sense of the shape and the white lights.  i knew it was not an airplane.  i thought it might be a blimp, but blimps do not refect white light.  it was already dark outside and to my knowledge blimps do not fly at night.  at first, the object looked like i was looking down into the bottom of a boat, but boats do not fly.  i concluded that what i was looking at was a aircraft--a ufo if you will.  it flew out of the trees moving south, stopped, hovered briefly between the trees, tilted slightly towards me, and descended.  this all took place within 10-15 seconds.  when it tilted and began to descend, i thought i saw a grey surface with a dome on top, but it was already in the top of the trees, and i could no longer see clearly.  i was frustrated:  i wanted to see more because i wanted to know what i was seeing.  while i was looking at it dead on, before it tilted and descended, i noticed what i thought were panels or sectioned windows that formed a strip across the aircraft.  the sections were difficult to make out.    
     my friend was on his motorcycle in front of me while i was following behind him:  i wanted to scream and honk my horn so that he would look up, but i knew that he wouldn't hear me over the engine of the motorcycle.  i wanted to call him on the phone, but he wouldn't answer and there wasn't enough time because everything happened so fast.  i  thought about turning around in order to put some distance between myself and the trees the aircraft had just disappeared behind, but i knew that i wouldn't be able to see more because it had already descended.  i didn't know what to do.  i wanted to call the police so i did.  i called 911 and spoke to a woman. i told her that i had just seen a ufo aircraft.  she asked me where i was.  (i am  terrible at directions, new to the dallas area, and i was slightly rattled.)  i told her that i was traveling west on greenbriar heading towards kessler parkway--that i was now passing threw the intersection of kessler parkway and sylvan, just south of i-30, going to my friend's condo.  i told her, "i am not nuts.  i am a school teacher."
     i was overwhelmed and a little shook when i arrived at my friend's condo, and a little scared.  i wanted to know where it landed because the area where it descended appeared to be a neighborhood.  there was no place for something that large to land.  i met my friend at the gate of his condo where he approached my window to ask me a question, and i told him that i had just called the police to report that i had just seen a ufo aircraft.   
     what i saw was not bouncing white lights, nor was it a white, oval shaped object jetting around from one place to another in the sky.  what i saw was an aircraft of some kind.  it appeared quite large.  there was a plane in the southwestern sky in the distance with a red light.  judging from the plane in the distance and the trees the aircraft hovered between, the aircraft seemed quite large.  i have no idea how large.  
     it is very difficult to process something like this when something like this happens.  again, i was overwhelmed and scared when i arrived at my friend's condo:  i did not want to be left alone outside while i unloaded my car at my friend's condo.  i kept looking through the trees in the direction of steven's golf course waiting for the aircraft to ascend.  
     (i told several teacher friends the next morning when i arrived on campus.  i don't care what they think:  i know what i saw.  whatever it was i have never seen anything like it.  i have never seen an aircraft descend straight down like that.)    
     my friend and i drove back to my apartment so i could show him where i saw it.  we drove around in the area where i thought it went down, but there are homes there, and no place for such a thing to land.  i asked my friend if it could have landed at stevens golf course, but he said the area i was pointing to was west of stevens.  i went home to my friend's condo, and i kept asking him what i should do.  i wanted to call my brother-in-law who is an air traffic controller at michum airport, but it was too late.  i wanted to call someone at bell helicopter, or uta, or the news, or call the police back.  i watched the 9:00 news and the 10:00 o'clock news hoping someone had called in and reported seeing what i had seen.  mostly, i just wanted to know if anyone saw what i saw around 8:30 pm on april 1st, 2013.    
     please let me know if someone else reported seeing something that resembles what i am reporting.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: White blimp shape appeared out of the trees flying south, hovered, tilted toward me and descended straight down

content.detailedDescription: A friend of mine posted something on facebook about seeing something in the sky to the west, that she could not figure out.  i went outside to see for myself.  i was paying attention to a bright star, which may be venus but i am not positive.  it was a bright star none the less.  i realized there was a dim, white light moving in circles to the south of the bright star.  i continued to watch the dim light until it exploded into a bright red flash, which then continued to rapidly flash the bright red color.  it moved in small circles and went from left to right in the sky very fast.  i love to watch the skies and have seen some things that i could not explain but nothing like this.  i attempted to video record the event but it just does not show up properly with my video camera, possibly due to the age of the camera.  regardless, i felt compelled to contact mufon as i believe this to be a ufo.  whether or alien or not, i have never seen anything like this in the skies above michigan.
content.summary: Crazy star-like object

content.detailedDescription: My mom and best friend came out of my parents house to see my friend off at 9:20 pm eastern time. as my friend was pulling out of the driveway my mom sited a very unusual formation of three unusually large bright golden light orbs angled (to the right) in a straight line equidistant from each other hovering above and beyond her neighbor's house above the trees behind it in akron, ohio at the top of firestone hill (the highest point in akron, ohio). the lights seemed to just hover at an angle for 10 minutes then very slowly the angle changed to the left and started slowly moving to the east. the lower orb could be seen moving behind the trees. my mom got my friend out of the car to see what was going on. the orbs continued to move very slowly for another ten minutes then just vanished. this location is pretty high up and has very little light pollution if any due to their location.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 large orbs angled in a straight line, hovered then moved south then southeast and vanished.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my couch watching tv when i looked out the living room window and spotted a bright orb-like object that appeared to be traveling directly toward me. it seemed to be moving about the same speed as an airplane, but the light did not blink. there was no visible emissions trail or anything of the sort. i yelled for my fiance to come look at the object. we watched it together for at least 30 seconds and it seemed to still be traveling directly toward us, but then it vanished suddenly. my fiance grabbed our binoculars and went outside to try to find the object in the sky, but was unable to.
content.summary: A bright orb-like object was traveling toward witnesses. it vanished suddenly approximately 1 minute after the initial sighting.

content.detailedDescription: We were looking at the stars at about nine oclock. there was one bright light in the middile of the big dipper. we thought it was a satellite. then the light split into two and bothed moved along a parallel path. they were a reddish pink and slowly dissapeared.
content.summary: A light that split into two then both moved along a parelel path then slowly dissapeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was laying in bed looking out of my window when i saw a bright light appear in the middle of the sky and it moved straight down. it had a short trail behind it. almost as if it was a flare. it was in the direction of the nearby naval base. i know it was not a flare because it only lasted about 3 seconds and i have never seen them test flares. i work on the base. it was a bright white light that was pulsating. time wazoo 10:33 pm on april 2nd 2013. clear sky's. there were no planes in the sky and it couldn't have been a shooting star because it didn't appear in the upper atmosphere like shooting stars do. my best guess is that it started out about 400-600 feet in the air. it seemed to be about 2-5 miles north east of me. it went down very quickly and went out of my view due to the surrounding trees and buildings. yay! my first sighting in years!
content.summary: Bright light that started falling straight down from the middle of the sky. it wasn't a shooting star.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were coming home from slot car racing about 9pm on our bikes. we stopped at his house and all of a sudden a bright round obect flew over our heads towards san fransisco. it went from horizon to horizon in a few seconds. it looked like about the size of a full moon. made no sound, and never lost altitude. it was faster than anything made then or since. we didn't know what it was. never seen anything like it. it just went straight across the sky.We were dumb founded. both just said what the the heck was that?!It just kept going until it was out of sight..This was in 1964
content.summary: My friend and i were standing by his house when a brilliant round object came over at a very high rate of speed. it never changed altitude

content.detailedDescription:
Hello

recently i saw something unexplainable, on march 24th at approx. 8:30pm i was in waldorf, maryland driving on mattawoman-beantown rd in moderate snowfall, when i saw lights that appeared to be a small plane landing with its landing lights and i saw a red blinking light, although i thought i was weird because there is no airport near there, as i drove further up the road i noticed that it was hovering and not flying, i thought surely its a helicopter and i must have mistook the search light for landing lights. as we drove under the object, i could clearly see a black triangle with three red lights on the bottom that alternated flashing in a clockwise motion, no two light were on simultaneously, also there was a light at each corner that resembled a car's headlights but searching in a sweeping motion. i exclaimed what is that! my 13yo son stopped playing his tablet and looked at  the object and said "wow that is weird"...As we drove down the street the object stay perfectly still until we drove out of view. my girlfriend who was driving could not see the object as it was above the passenger side of the vehicle...She asked if i wanted to turn around and go back but my fear of being spotted trumped my curiosity.....After seeing it i drew a picture of it  which i can email to you as we'll as a map diagram where this took place.

on march 30th the object was spotted again approx. 11-1130pm in waldorf maryland less than 2 miles from the first sighting....This time the object flew overhead near the house off a friend of mine. i was not witness to the second event, but my friend that lives there witnessed the craft with two others. i've known this man since 5th grade and i'm a 31 yo man and he doesn't pull pranks or lie about these types of things nor would i.....



thank you
content.summary: Hovering black triangle in a snow storm - mar. 25 2013

content.detailedDescription: Stationary triangle object, height about 800-1000' size 200-300' in length aprox. edges of triangle were rounded w/ three white lights. redish light on center of bottom. no noise, no movement for at least four min.Time 8:15 pm driving home from unionville town ctr. stoped at a quite intersection and watched and listened as it was then almost directly overhead. cross roads of rt162 and brandwine creek road.No problem if you would like drawing
content.summary: Triangle rounded edges, three white lights red light on bottom ctr

content.detailedDescription: Me and my wife during a walk with our three dogs stopped in the little park at the end of the street. i observed in this evening clear sky jupiter next to the moon. i'm an amateur of astromical observation so i always head up during these walks. suddenly in right of the moon,  a huge ufo ( bullet shape) in high stratosphere (entering from space ?) to follow the earth curve with incredible speed. it was not a meteor ; i know the difference : no tracing or fire) ; only a clear shape, no noise. it from east go to west during 3-4 secondes and desappear in the night. it was near big than the moon. it was glow white color. i was very impressed by this so fast and big object. i was the only witness , my wife looked the dogs..
content.summary: Huge ufo in high stratosphere (entering from space ?) to follow the earth curve with incredible speed, not a meteor ; i know the diff)

content.detailedDescription:
As a hobby, i take pictures of the environment to be used as screensaver pictures (such as, flowers, sky/skyline and different birds). 

however, on 3/5/13 at 6:30 pm, via my cell phone camera,the attached image presented itself. please, see the attachment. i hope someone from mufon will please, call me to let me know what i've captured because o am very curious.

thank you,
jocqui (jockey)
content.summary: There are multiple entities in the attached photo

content.detailedDescription:
I live out in the country and enjoy looking at the sky in the evening from behind my picture window in the dining room that faces east. the evening of october 27, 2011 had clear skies and it was almost dark at 8:20 pm. while i was walking by the picture window, i noticed something going on and off so i decided to look. it was a red, round light that suddenly was gone and 3 seconds or so reappears further away, then the light was gone again, followed by reappearing, but closer, it was the size of a basketball and was hanging in the ne skies, seemingly quite close. this happened about 4 four times or so; lights off, reappears in different location. 
i could not figure out what this could possibly be. because i have never seen anything like this (i have seen many airplanes and helicopters in the skies), i called my husband to check on this red light. while he was taking his time coming from the family room, i noticed at least 9 helicopters, flashing their lights (red, green, white, blue) following state route 105 that runs parallel to the portage river, about 1/2 mile from my house. some were above the tree tops, some were not. this was strange to see that many helicopters going the same direction sw to se and 2 or so from south to north, and so close to each other. 
i immediately thought that there is an emergency situation at the brush wellman, a company that is located about 1.5 miles se of my home and that has big us governmental nasa/defense contracts, or the davis bessie nuclear power plant, located about 15 miles ne from my home. i opened up the door next to the window that leads into the backyard, and at that point i seen the large red light go way up, not in a straight line, but more in a curve. then all the "helicopters" suddenly were white in color and followed the red light, they all went up in a curve, and were several miles up in the clear night sky. the former red light remained the largest and ended up in the center, surrounded by at least 2 dozen smaller globes. i then realized these were not helicopters! i watched for a few seconds and the orbs seem to become one large bright circle touching the big one that remained in the center. but then it seems as if they were playing, i.E. some were going in and out the circle, making erratic maneuvers. what a sight to see.
my husband and 13 year old granddaughter joined me and they thought it was great to see this display of white lights high up in the sky. i on the other hand, got suddenly scared and went into the house, and tried to talk them to come back in the house as well which they did not do. they stood outside for the longest time, while i was inside, feeling scared. after about 20 minutes or so, my husband and granddaughter came in, not because the orbs were gone, but it was too cold to be outside that long. we still talk about it quite a bit - i now have my regular watch behind the picture window every evening. my granddaughter and i are convinced that these were beings from other places in our cosmos. my husband already knew about ufos, he seen a ufo from close up when working outside in the railroad yard one evening in 1996, right above the tree tops, going over him, "as big as a football field".  
i wonder if this event occurred because the day before my neighbors home was raided by many police, fbi & such, because of growing an illegal substance in the basement. there were about 15 cop cars, maybe more, parked in front of their house and driveway most of the day, with a lot of commotion. this event and activities are highly unusual in my neighborhood where it usually is quite. i wonder if the police radios caught the attention of aliens and they decided to check it out ...
content.summary: 1 large red globe, and at least 10 crafts that had the lights  like helicopters.

content.detailedDescription: I thought i was going crazy because i kept seeing two people in our yard and would even go in house and tell my mom tbere were people out there and i wanted to call cops! she would finaly convince me no one was there or the dogs would have been barking? after several weeks of this happening we talked about it in detail and she said she had similarly experiences when she was younger and there were also two 'people?' i had never heard about it and mom is one of the most stable people you will ever meet! after one night of this experiance i was kind of asked? in my head if i wanted to go with them? something i always said was i would go with if i ever had the chance lol ya sounds funny now anyway i said no i have a grandchild now. are there other types of family conections like this? thank you.
content.summary: No ufo but two entity's

content.detailedDescription: I was watching a show yesterday about a women from bucks county that saw a swarm of blinking light and it sounded a lot like what i saw, this happened over 28 years ago, and at the time when i mentioned it to anyone they thought i was crazy so i never mentioned it again, ive told my husband and kid the story and got the same reaction, last night i told them thats the same thing i saw. this is my story.....I was with some friends coming back from visiting another friend at in greenville pa. nothing special she just started college there and we went to see her and we were coming back route 18 then when we got on route 322 just out side of conneaut lake about 3:00am, i was in the back seat, just staring out the window when i notice lights, it looked like a big check mark, i looked at the speedometer to make sure my friend wasn't speeding thinking it was a police helicopter, but it didn't look like a helicopter, i now hear it described as boomerang, thats the best i can call it, i asked my friends if they where seeing it and they said, yes what is it, i tried to make out an exact shape but it was just to dark, it seemed to be tracking us off to our left just above the trees, all the way from conneaut lake heading east when we got almost to route 19 it shot straight ahead really fast then stopped and hovered over the mall we slowed down to see if  we could see the shape better, we still couldn't tell, as we got almost to the mall it shot really fast across in front of us and stopped and hovered over a church, ,there is a stop light in front of the mall and it was red we stopped and just watch this thing, no more than 50yards away, and i'm not sure if it landed or what, but all of a sudden there was a swarm of thousands of bright blinking lights, i'd never seen anything like it in my life and i wanted my friends to pull over so we could watch it for awhile to see what it was, but they said no way and just kept driving, i turned around in the seat and watched it as long as i could see it, i was so excited, i think we just saw a ufo, i told my friends. i told other people about it thinking they would think it pretty cool but all i got was laughed at and teased so i never mentioned it again, to this day i can't even remember the friends i was with,but i remember the thing i saw and it was just like what that lady in bucks county saw, a swarm of thousands of bright blinking lights, it was over 28 years ago i'm 48 years old now and the time and date may be off a bit and i've never seen anything like it sense, but i did see it, and i keep watching thinking maybe i'll see it again someday. i'm reluctant now to even mention what i saw, because of the reaction a got then and even now, so please do not mention my name, but i thought you should know that the swarm of bright blinking lights, it happened back in the 80's too.
content.summary: Tracked us for sometime, off to our left, shot ahead fast,hovered over a mall,then shot across our path to the left,i don't remember it landing,i just remember a swarm of thousands of bright blinking lights,beside a church, we just kept driving.

content.detailedDescription: My granddaughter who took photos was in the car with her mother, uncle, and cousin. it was spring break they were coming from mo. to my home in central illinois. march 27, 2013.. when they were just south of springfield my granddaughter thought the moon looked strange so she got her camera out to take photos. then she notice a very large arrangements of lights. she took photos. when she showed them to me. i told her you got a perfect clear photo of a triangle.. she said grandma . it keep changing shape of lights. then she show me more photos. it was a triangle with a tail of five lights. she said it had windows between the main body and the straight long line of tale lights. . one small blue light was inside the triangle .. her mother could not see it. it was to the east and my daughter was driving due north. her mother kept telling her it had to be a plane. she told me grandma it was no plane. it was huge.. she said she got scared a little when she seen it much closer..... my son was in the back seat behind driver. his son was on the east side window but he is autistic so he would not be a witness.
content.summary: Triangle with long tail of five lights , in between this was a row of window ..All white lights with one blue light inside the triangle

content.detailedDescription: Around 10:30pm i went to open the window and when i pulled up the blinds i saw a circular object with flashing lights slowly hovering over homes here in copperas cove, tx. at first i thought it was a plane, but ive lived here since june 2010 and the planes that ive seen never fly so low, are loud, and never this shape with all those lights flashing in a circular direction. then i thought it was a helicopter, even though i know helicopters arent circular shaped however the propellers do go in a circular motion, i convinced myself that it could be that, so i listened for the sound and everything was silent. it was so weird. definitely wasnt a helicopter. so i called my husband to come quick because i wanted him to explain what i was seeing. at this point the object had moved west but my husband was able to observe it before our view would be obstructed by distant homes. after a few seconds of silence, my husband said, "i think that was a ufo." my thought exactly but i didnt say it because i didnt want to sound dumb and/or influence his thoughts. my husband is in the military and assured himself as well as me, that it wasnt flares. he seemed confused. he also noticed that i was feeling nervous and that i kept going back to look out the window so he then said, "maybe it was a uav". so i started to second guess myself. i got on the internet researched uavs and let me tell you, i am more convinced now that we saw a ufo. uavs are a significantly smaller, do not have all the lights i saw, and not circular (disc) shaped. after reading into uavs, i googled ufo sightings in copperas cove, tx and one other person commented about it, but just said it was scary, and didnt give much information. i would like to know that we arent the only ones that saw this. hoping other people come forward. should have recorded it.
content.summary: Circular object with flashing lights hovers over homes in copperas cove,tx

content.detailedDescription: I had just gone to bed, then i heard my neighbor yell, "hey rick, come and see the ufo!  i got up and went outside too see it.  i stood under the craft that looked like a circular set of lights resembling beams of white light like a car has.  the craft moved in to position from over the top of my condo.  it hovered without wobbling, but did move side to side slightly like it was being dynamically positioned.  i thought it was one of the drones that verizon now sells - but now i'm sure it was bigger than what they sell with many lights (5 or 6).  my neighbors said they saw 3 flying drone type circular arranged lighted craft exit the large flying wing mothercraft! also, a very,very bright red lighted orb which seemed to control or exchange energy with the other craft!  the mothership would jump accross the horizon then really fast jump back!  the 3 flying circular lighted drones and the red orb left and returned to the mothercraft. i think it may be advanced military designs  being used against and in route to north korea!
content.summary: Circular lighted, 5 or 6 lights, like car headlights, hovering, being dynamically positioned and returning to mothercraft.  bright red light seen by neighbors and two more lighted circular arranged drones  and large flying wing mother ship jumping accross

content.detailedDescription:
Well, i am a gamer, a person who plays games alot. and one evening i was playing video games, modern warfare 2 to be exact. and i thought i saw a really big plane, because i have a window that is close to the direction alot of planes come in, because i live close to alair airport. i thought it was a stealth bomber, but then i realized, stealth bombers are more huge that that thing, and the make so much noise.So i walked over to the window to see a triangular shape w/ lights that flew in a straight flight path, then stopped.
it hovered over one of my neighbors yards, the blasted off into like hyperspace. i literally had to change my pants i was so scared.
i didn't lose sight of the object, it flew up in the sky, fast as light speed.
content.summary: Triangular shape w/ lights

content.detailedDescription:
We were in the backyard playing a lawn game @ appx. 9:45 pm on saturday mar. 30th 2013 ( easter eve ). my teammate was getting ready to throw when he stopped and said " what the hell is that ? " i looked up as did two of our friends looking toward the nw. there were appx. 16 to 20 lights that were slowly blinking.At 1st i was thinking this was a very large airplane, but reminded myself that there was no sound. my husband yelled out to get someone to record what we were seeing. my husband then grabbed his i phone and proceeded to record. we yelled at another friend to go get his kids ( ages 16, 11, and 10 ) to get them from inside the house as we wanted them to see this as well. the lights spanned appx. the width of a football field or more moving towards the east. this was not a fast movement and there was absolutely zero sound. as the lights moved east, they ramndomly blinked and formed a variety of shapes, some in triangles. as they turned slowly towards the direct north they formed triangles before disappearing.
another friend kept saying "what is this " "what is this". after they disappeared, we called the police dept. too see if anyone else had reported strange lights. no one had. we called the local tv station as well. no one reported seeing anything either. we sat down after all this disappeared and were trying to pick apart and rationally try to figure out what we had just witnessed. we rejected airplane as there was no sound and it would have had to have been a large aircraft. we also thought maybe it was several planes ( prop like ) but that would have meant 16 t 20 prop planes on a saturday night. not likely. we discussed a military operation, but again no sound. not really sure what we witnessed. the video attached has to be viewed on full screen with lights out as this was recorded with a little iphone and that is the best way to view.
content.summary: Appx. 16-20 blinking lights, that changed shape. several remained triangles until they disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
A few blocks from home going to the grocery about 9pm on a sunday we came to the cross street and stopped.  there was no other traffic out (not unusual)so when we saw this dark object hovering over the vacant land in front to the right of us, we asked each other to identify it and my husband turned on the road to the right (which is where we intended to go anyway) and very slowly drove up to the side of the vacant lot. we watched it through the front windshield until we were passing next to it and watched it through the side driver window all the while noting that there was no sound or lights.  it was a blackish gray metal looking disk that had some texture or attached coverings like ridges.  it seem like the grass moved slightly, but it was not more than maybe a good evening breeze would have done.  at the time, we were alarmed, but more curious than scared.  i was excited and wanted to find out what it was or if anyone else had seen it.  after it started moving straight up it then veered slightly to the east continuing upward and it must have started moving very fast because it went out of sight rather quickly once it go so high.  to estimate the size of the craft, the land it was hovering over was a vacant commercial lot, so in perspective, it was easy to estimate it had to be about 100 feet in diameter (at least).  it was actually so dull and dark it was like looking at a metal aircraft with gray black primer paint which caused detail on it hard to see but easy to see the shape contrast against the sky.  it didn't appear to have any lights on or in it.

we were only a few hundred feet from the grocery parking lot and went in and parked.  my husband stayed in the car and i hurried inside and just stood looking quickly around to see if anyone looked like they had seen it too.  no one (but me) seemed to be acting unusual so we hurried home to wait for the 10pm news to see if any reports would be on. there was nothing in the media at all and we didn't know who to report it too without being called crazy, so we didn't talk about it at all. we live a few miles away from a navy base and the airfield is very active, but since my husband was a navy flight engineer on an aircraft carrier, i think we would have had some idea what aircraft it could have been.  we had no sensible answer to describe what we witnessed that night but we both are certain that we saw something very real!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Clear fall evening husband and i saw a craft almost on the lot across the road. we had the windows open and drove very slowly next to it watching it until it ascended out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving port orchard heading towards tacoma from sedgewick rd onramp,as soon as i got on the freeway itsself,boom there they were at my 12 oclock low i estimate it at about 1000 feet maximum height from the ground.Three bright lights stationary dead ahead.Its dark and you have trees on both sides of the freeway.The lights were between the trees dead ahead.At first i thought it was planes coming in for a landing at tacoma narrows munincple airport,but as the freeway keeps winding every mile or so,the trees would block out the object[s]until and at the same time reveal other parts of the sky.When i saw the objects stationary again same intensity of light,[very very bright],you could see off to the right of them,there was a small plane with the red and green lights on each wingtip.Also you can see the commercial and or military planes to the left on thier regulur paths to seatac and mccord afb.I dont think they saw it but im 1000% sure the small aircraft did cuz he was very close to the objects.I lost sight of them on the next curve that was blocked by the trees ,also i was speeding towards the direction and i wasnt the only one ,someone in a soccer mom van flew right past me i was doing about 75 they musta been doing 90+ trying to see them again i assume.When it cleared up from the trees of course they were gone but the small plane was doing circles above the farmland down below.My feelings are that theyre here.Im mean they are here!This is actually my 4th or 5th sighting ,my second best.It was dark but they were low,stationary,and brightly lit,if it was 1 solid object ,i bs you not it had 2 have been a mile maybe in length.Triangle formation of lights i never seen before.Ima tell you about the other sightings i had .And fortunatly i had witnesses to my best sighting.Mccord afb,summer 2012,a stationary oroange {fireball} i guess best describes it,hard to describe something you dont know,anyways after a couple minutes,it shot out straight to the ground on the military base another but even smaller {fireball] and when it did that ,we rushed the car to get down to mccord afb to see ,but it was gone when we got there.My [family member] was shocked when i called her out because i saw another one about 2 weeks prior to that so ive been skywatching ever since then.I would like to believe theyre ours but the sighting i had prior to the afb one,i was smoking outside no not dope either i saw what looked like 2 satellites side by side ,i thought nothing of it at first but i never seen satelites side by side like that so i kept watching.I still think one was a satelite but the one on the left came to a dead stop,moved to the left,went back to its original stop point,moved to the right about equal distance,went back to its stop point,then it just went bright as hell ,then it appeared as if it went higher into space,or disappeared right there,i think it went up though because you could still see the brightness of the light deminishing.Man i wish i had a good camera. i would like to apolagize to all the people who been called crazy,i used to be the one calling everyone nutcases and for that,my story is being shared.At the time of my first sighting,i kept seeing [doyon government constuction trucks] all over,so i did some research and found out they specialize in underground facilities ,and they have 3 major outfits based outta alaska state.Im not an investigator of anykind.Just the thought of oanother race of beings staring down at us like earth is some kind of ant farm to them is scary thought.Ima just say it ,when you combine abductions,the cover up by our goverment,implants,makes me wonder are some of us being sacraficed,obviously you cant beat a force thats greatly more advanced than us,its probably best we play along until we aquire,something that can put us on a equal playing field.I dont think et is gonna go for that.Why do i think this is because you can find more abundant resources on any planet,except humans .I know its lot to absorb but ive been holding it in 4 awhile.Thanks for reading.Btw look op during these summer clear nights especially in june july thats when i had my best sightings.
content.summary: Unsure if it was 1 solid object or three seperate ones in a stationary triangle formation

content.detailedDescription:
I was just getting off the 13 trolley after a half day school day and walking home to my house on a relatively sunny wednesday afternoon. i had then walked up to my house and was just about to grab the door knob when a sudden almost electric feeling shot through my body and i just got a feeling that said "look up now." surely enough as i slowly looked up over the house i heard a sudden "wooshing noise coming towards my direction and after a second or so the object suddenly appeared over the house and stopped there at almost what seemed like lightning speed. spooked i moved back towards the sidewalk to get a better view of it. it was a huge object an oval and three circle lights in a triangle shape underneath like bright headlights and a domed cylindrical top part that was slightly away over the house and i didn't have a great perception but it had to have been the size of at least three cars i'll assume. it moved slowly towards the west direction from my house until i thought "hey maybe they're friendly!" and waved at it and shouted "hey!" it then suddenly stopped and shined a beam of light on me. it then started to move closer to me still slightly high in the air. ironically, i just so happened to have a colorless and colored camera with me for a project i was doing with taking pictures and used the camera to try to take some pictures of the object as it moved slowly towards me. however, common sense kicked in and i became frightened because the light was now shining down on me and i thought " hey i might get abducted" and tried to move away from the light although it followed me and then i thought "hey if i make my camera look like a gun maybe it will move away?" i did and after a second or two it stopped shining the light and moved away towards the east. as it did and moved toward the tree i quickly entered the house and alerted my mother inside that there was a ufo over the house! she didn't come out but i then took my camera out as it was a little higher now and eastward and was able to take two pictures of the object. the first one didn't come out right and the second picture is kind of blurry and i'm not sure if it was my finger print or not but after that it went behind the large tree outside my house and when i went to look it was gone.

a couple weeks later as i was watching video's online home alone around 7:00 at nighti suddenly heard a helicopter over the house and it got louder and louder and closer to the roof until it was literally shuttering the roofs rafters it was so close. i then ran into my room afraid that it might be some group searching for me like men in black or something and stayed in my room for about 5-10 minutes until it finally went away and about a couple hours later my family came home.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It was a wednesday, and a half day from school. i grabbed the doorknob to my house when i suddenly got a feeling that said "look up now."

content.detailedDescription:
Walking to my car. 
the lights in the sky were blinking. 
thought it was an airplane but then noticed there were more lights than normal.
the object hovered in the same position from my viewing location. it appeared to be stationary. 
i have at least 10 min of footage/photos/ audio 
audio recording of military jet  in area. this is not uncommon for my area as they train nearby.
i ran to get my camera and tripod to video and called for my other roommates to witness the object.
the object then fell from the sky downward and disappeared.
i was a cavalry scout for 15 years and a trained professional when it comes to identifying aircrafts - i have never witnessed anything like this before

 from myself to the object was maybe 10k in straight line distance. the size of the object was approx 1 to 2 inches in the sky.  you do the math. all i can say is it must have been very long and large in size.
content.summary: 5-7  lights blinking - in a row, maybe a boomerang or triangle

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
pregnant and sleeping next to my husband.

2. what made you first notice the object?
i woke up and heard and saw a small like bird hitting the window. then entered the room. i tried to wake my husband but he wouldn't wake up.

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
just a small robin bird hitting the window or injured bird trying to enter through the window.

4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.
when the bird entered the room, through the window, a vortex opened in the middle of the ceiling. out of the vortex was a huge massive shadow of a winged structure. the wings spread across the bedroom ceiling. as the wings were flapping, tons of grey dust-like triangular flakes started to fall. as the dust flakes started to land on me, they turned very pretty platinum white flakes but they disappeared. i was screaming and the entity was holding me down and had my arms and hands pinned down spread across the bed. i told the entity that i am so scared that i am having a heart attack and my chest was solidly tight. but the entity said nothing but started this heavy wind gust down on me, as if it was trying to rid me of negativity and fear. i also told the entity that i have sinned and that i have problems with family and relationships. the entity took my advice and spread my legs and entered me with an appendage and pressing on my chest and pressing my babys head. as the entity was pressing on my chest with doctor like hands, all  i could see was the cherib-like angel (that was sitting on the left wing of the angel taking notes with an ancient stylus pen and ancient tablet. at the same time, many cheribs were attached to each of the wings and they were all talking to each other about me and problems of the world. at this point, i was relaxed and stated i saw that pen in a history book and the paper tablet looks like papapyrus cloth. when i said that, the head on the entity turned from the monk like hood to a lions switching and shaking the head as if it was battling an evil entity that came out of me. i started to stare with the impression of why these two entities are fighting over me. as i was staring also it elevated me in the air and pulled me into a pasture were there were thousands of sheep and beyond the horizon, i saw a man with his back turned staring onto the horizon sunset with the sheep and i in back of him. as i was walking through the herds of sheep there was a disfigured sheep that looked as if it suffered radiation because it had many eyes and the head was larger than the rest of the herd.As i looked at one of the eyes, it had my reflection in it, as if it had been watching me for many years.
then i floated back in my body and the entity stated "fear not, danger ahead". it was staring at me,for 5-10 minutes after the statement and then folded the vortex like a thin flat inch 70inch flat screen tv and the huge bird like human monk-like animal spirit shrunk like a robin bird and flew out the window. i was yelling please take me i don't want to be here anymore. the little bird flew out the window without acknowledging what i said.
content.summary: Bird like structure with massive wings, with altenating human animal head, human head was monk like, animal head was a ancient lion.

content.detailedDescription: String of lights blinking
content.summary: String of lights

content.detailedDescription: I was waiting for even to take him to work at the bakery.  i was in my car facing west looking at the sunset.  it was light out side. right in my field of vision, there was a sudden appearance of the bright ball streaking down with things breaking off of it and the things went out and the main body just went to the ground. i though it was a crashing plane.  it was in front of the setting sun and it was still very bright. the object went down below the horizon.
content.summary: Bright ball streaking down with pieces breaking off and then blinking out
